subject: physics
title: Structure of the Universe MCQ problems

problems.author: Thenura Wickramaratna
problems.question: What is the largest structure in the known universe?
problems.hint: It's a massive group of galaxy clusters.
problems.detailed: Galaxy superclusters are among the largest structures in the universe, consisting of many galaxy clusters bound together by gravity.

problems.author: Thenura Wickramaratna
problems.question: Which of the following is the correct order from smallest to largest?
problems.hint: Start from the object we live on.
problems.detailed: The correct order of size is: Planet → Star → Galaxy → Universe.

problems.author: Thenura Wickramaratna
problems.question: What is a galaxy?
options: A large collection of stars, gas, and dust
The name of a star system
problems.detailed: A galaxy is a massive system composed of stars, gas, dust, and dark matter, all bound together by gravity.

problems.author: Thenura Wickramaratna
problems.question: Which galaxy do we live in?
problems.hint: It has a name related to a dairy product.
problems.detailed: Earth is located in the Milky Way Galaxy, a barred spiral galaxy that contains our solar system.

problems.author: Thenura Wickramaratna
problems.question: What force holds galaxies, stars, and planets together in the universe?
problems.hint: It’s the weakest but acts over long distances.
problems.detailed: Gravity is the force responsible for the structure and formation of galaxies, stars, and planetary systems throughout the universe.
